definitions: The act of marking an area or boundary with stakes.
The act of supporting a plant with a stake.
The act of risking money or something valuable on the outcome of a game, race, or other uncertain event.
The act of claiming a right or ownership to something, often by marking it.
The act of killing a vampire by driving a stake through its heart.
examples: They are staking out the perimeter.
She is staking the young tree.
He is staking a lot of money on the horse.
They are staking their claim to the land.
The hunter is staking the creature.
